Title: Chapter 41
Writer: Michael Dobbs (based on the novels by), Andrew Davies (based on the mini-series by), Beau Willimon (created for television by), Melissa James Gibson, Laura Eason (executive story editor), Bill Kennedy (executive story editor)
Actors: Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright, Michael Kelly, Mahershala Ali
Plot: As Claire begins exploring a campaign of her own, she and Frank engage in backdoor political maneuvering. But this time they're not on the same side.
